Message:
“We’ll pay for our sins
with our lives. So please...
Please forgive our daughter.”

I heard voices on
the other side of the door.

They were my parents’ voices.
Their final voices...

Everything that happened
after that is really hazy.

When the Church’s Knights came
to calm down the commotion,
they laughed, saying...

It was as if a gust of wind
had blown me straight
to the finish line of a race.
My mind was so clear.
It all finally made sense.
